com.safenetinc.luna.exception

Class LunaCryptokiException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • java.lang.RuntimeException
          • java.security.ProviderException
            • com.safenetinc.luna.exception.LunaCryptokiException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class LunaCryptokiException
extends java.security.ProviderException
    Thrown by the Luna security provider when errors occur in the Cryptoki native library. The nature of the exception will be explained in the exception text and in the Cryptoki return code.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
